Literature.Title: Hydrophobic Control of the Bioactivity and Cytotoxicity of de Novo-Designed Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Gong H, Zhang J, Hu X, Li Z, Caiaffa KS, Liu H, Waigh TA, McBain A, Lu JR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=26.7±8.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=12±4.4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=256±70µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=3±1µM)
